subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Williams asserted her brilliance in a 6-7 (3), 6-2, 6-2 victory in the fourth round of the BNP Paribas Open, beating an opponent who appears to have regained at least some of her old form.
snippet: Williams asserted her brilliance in a 6-7 (3), 6-2, 6-2 victory in the fourth round of the BNP Paribas Open, beating an opponent who appears to have regained at least some of her old form.
